testcase.name: Create an account
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to 'https://www.johnlewis.com/' homepage...................passed And I accept all cookies....................................................passed And I click on login to john lewis button...................................passed And I should see the login page.............................................passed And I select create an account button.......................................passed And I should see the 'Create an account' page...............................passed And I enter my email and password...........................................passed And I select subscribe option...............................................passed
